definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (abundance; on form and mng. of this and the foll. n.pr.v. Lag:BN 52, 198)—
father of Moses' wife Ex 4:18 a (E; prob. txt. err., elsewhere [[יִתְרוֹ]], q.v.)
eldest son of Gideon Ju Jdg 8:20, LXX Ieqer.
father of Amasa 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:32, 1Ch 2:17, LXX Ieqer; = [[יִתְרָא]] 2Sa 17:25, LXX Ioqer, Ioqor; LXXL Ieqer.
a man of Asher 1Ch 7:38 ( = [[יִתְרָן]] v:1Ch 7:37), LXX Ieqer, A Ieqhr, LXXL [v:1Ch 7:39] Eqran.
